attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'Ban ALL
Discrimination & any groups for a specific type of person(s)' and integrate rather than segregate

I declare that the UK bans all discrimination of any kind.

No one should be given any preferential treatment of any kind,
regardless of race, age, sex, gender, etc.

All people should be based on merit on what is best and not on
anything else.

No one should be employed on any basis other than merit and are
they best for the position, and not to meet
do-gooders requirements that they feel an area is under
represented... 

in the long term under representation will correct itself and
does not need government interference which
brings trouble and only fuels hard line groups and people

Better to act for long term than short term measures which will
only fuel resentment.

This should be done for all walks of life, not just in the work
place.

In addition to this I feel groups set up for certain areas and
specific types of people should be banned

By doing this it would ensure all groups are open and improve
integration and not segregation.
